settings.richtext: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more…

settings.title: Steel Maces
settings.text: Our steel maces are forged from solid steel and sport a knurled grip for intense workouts. Enhance your grip strength, stabilize your shoulders and increase your core rotational strength. The steel mace is the ultimate full-body conditioning tool and it's virtually indestructible.

settings.title: Mace Training Guide
settings.text: Use our 84-page Steel Mace Training Guide to apply foundational movement-based training techniques to your Steel Mace training. Includes over 39 exercises (videos + instructions) with many progressions, categorized by our steel mace foundational movement standard and mace skill level. We also teach you how to flow with a steel mace (6-movement advanced flow!).

settings.title: Mace Smart Poster
settings.text: Our Steel Mace Exercise "Smart" Poster features 27 exercises categorized by core, upper body, lower body, total body, and swing. Each exercise has a scannable QR code so you can watch a demo video of the movement from your smart phone. All you have to do is open your camera app, point it at the QR code and click the link to watch the steel mace exercise.

settings.title: SFS FIVE Steel Mace
settings.text: The SFS FIVE Steel Mace Workout Package has 5 fun and challenging full length workouts that only require one piece of equipment, a steel mace! Each steel mace workout has a unique protocol, and when combined, they make for the perfect weekly workout routine.

settings.title: Actionable content
settings.text: We aim to provide actionable content and workouts that will enhance your overall performance, well-being and understanding of functional fitness and unconventional equipment.

settings.title: First class
settings.text: We stand by our products, and only offer you the highest quality. The days of over paying for first-class are over, come fly with us!

settings.title: Always ready
settings.text: It’s our job to serve you with nothing less than 100% satisfaction in quality products, shopping experience and customer service.

settings.title: SFS APPAREL
settings.subtitle: Check out our new line of shirts, hoodies and hats

settings.title: Training Guide
settings.subtitle: A Set for set guide of steel mace training with over 35 exercises!

settings.title: Introduction to the steel mace
settings.content: The Steel Mace is derived from an ancient weapon and training tool. It works core stability, rotational power, strength, endurance, and structural integrity. The offset weight challenges your body in a completely different way, making it easy to spot and target weak areas of your body. It’s an incredibly powerful tool for full body conditioning, increasing range of motion, strengthening stabilizer muscles, especially the shoulders, elbows and wrists, and preventing injuries. Whether you are a personal trainer, fighter, athlete or desk jockey, steel mace training will benefit you. Come train with us.

settings.title: Testimonials
settings.content:
"The steel mace is an awesome piece of equipment that will give you a serious workout! My shoulder mobility has greatly improved since I started implementing the mace into my routine." -Brice H.

"Mace training incorporates agility, balance, and coordination. I feel empowered like a warrior!" -Anne M.

"It's a great core workout as well as an effective way to work on grip strength." -Dan M.

settings.title: Exercise Library
settings.subtitle: Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced Exercises for serious full body conditioning.

settings.contact_content:
If you have any questions please contact us.

Let us know which educational programs you are interested in:
1. Workshop (personal trainers)
2. Classes
3. One-on-One Training
4. Online

Are you interested in bringing the steel mace workshop to your city? If so, where do you live?

We can also supply your steel mace workshop with macebells. Contact us for wholesale pricing.

settings.title: Kettlebells
settings.text: Our cast iron kettlebells are finished with an electrostatic black matte powder coating for better grip and durability. They are built to last a few lifetimes. Available sizes are 18, 26, 35, 40, 44, and 53 pounds. Get yourself one of the most versatile and dynamic training tools in fitness now.

settings.title: Kettlebell Training Guide
settings.text: Our 85-page Single Kettlebell Training e-Guide has 41 exercises based on our 6 Pillar Training System: Push, Pull, Squat & Lunge, Hinge, Snatch, and Clean. It also has 10 killer complexes! All of the exercises and complexes have step-by-step demo videos that you can follow along with to master the movement. At the end of the guide, we have an 8-week single kettlebell training program that keeps workouts fresh week to week.

settings.title: SFS FIVE Kettlebell
settings.text: The SFS FIVE Kettlebell Workout Package has 5 fun and challenging full length workouts that only require one piece of equipment, a kettlebell! Each kettlebell workout has a unique protocol, and when combined, they make for the perfect weekly workout routine.

settings.title: Resistance Bands
settings.text: Our heavy duty 41 inch power resistance bands (aka Loop Bands) are extremely versatile. You can use them during warm-up, workout, and recovery. Resistance bands are great for assisting and resisting workouts, decreasing fat, boosting stamina, preventing and rehabilitating injuries, and enhancing functional and athletic movements.

settings.title: Fabric Bands
settings.text: Our premium fabric resistance bands are the perfect addition to your leg and glute workouts. Thanks to the cotton-elastic blend, these bands are comfortable and they won't roll or slide. Moreover, they will never break! If you want to better activate your thighs, hips and booty when training your lower body, you need these non-slip fabric resistance bands.

settings.title: Band Training Guide
settings.text: Our 328-page Resistance Band e-Guide has over 250 exercises that are categorized by Mobility, Mobilization, Resistance Training, Assistance Training, Explosive Training, Barbell Training, Static Stretching, and (P)Rehabilitation. Each exercise includes a video demonstration with step-by-step instructions, cues, and targeted muscles. We also teach you how to create and program effective resistance band workouts!

settings.title: SFS FIVE Band
settings.text: The SFS FIVE Resistance Band Workout Package has 5 fun and challenging full length workouts using only resistance bands. Each workout targets different muscle groups. Together, the 5 workouts make for the perfect weekly workout routine.

settings.newsletter_richtext: At SFS we strive to equip you with the tools and knowledge needed for your fitness journey. Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases, killer workouts, actionable fitness content and more. As our motto goes - "You don't have to get ready if you stay #alwaysready!"

settings.greeting_message: 👋 Hi, message us with any questions. We're happy to help!
